title: Looking for a main JNG mid Diam + to join our team.
body:
Hi

Watermelon crew is looking for a main JNG pref challenger or diam 3+ to join our crew as a JNG, we have a jungle atm and the idea is to add more experience to our team in the jungle. We want to add a new style of jungle into our team.

Atm we have 3 challengers and 5 diam + players.

Please reply to this post or add me IGN Dr Watermelon
